title: 請問各位電腦高手 知唔知係咩問題 手提電腦閃mon

replies.msg:
https://streamable.com/vb6irl
係壞咩 同埋大概要整幾錢

入唔入到桌面？

顯卡如果冇問題就要去原廠配mon

街鋪冇得整嫁

quote.msg:

replies.msg:
入到 正常使用到
我以為軟件問題 所以重設電腦
但發現冇用

Is it a desktop? Or laptop?
If it is a desktop with a separate graphics card, try to resit the card.
If it is a built-in port, try to reconnect the cable, sometimes, one or more of the cable pins might be bent.
IF it is a laptop, the overheat could cause the shake or flashing screen.

quote.msg:

If it is a built-in port, try to reconnect the cable, sometimes, one or more of the cable pins might be bent.
IF it is a laptop, the overheat could cause the shake or flashing screen.

replies.msg:
係laptop
前排出現過同樣情況 跟住又自己冇事
如果係 overheat 熄機降溫就ok?

By trial and error:
- put the laptop on top of wrapped cold ice pack while you are using the laptop the normal manner.

replies.msg: DO NOT install the Drivereasy software on step #3, but go directly to Asus to download the graphics driver instead.

replies.msg:
thank you very much
已經down 左最新顯示卡驅動器
都係咁
我接另一個mon冇問題
只有laptop 個mon 有問題 可能係 laptop 個mon 壞
唔該曬

之前試過
發現係硬件問題
有時用得粗魯
屈咗個mon入面同motherboard之間嘅連接位
自己整返正就一直無事

quote.msg:
之前試過
發現係硬件問題
有時用得粗魯
屈咗個mon入面同motherboard之間嘅連接位
自己整返正就一直無事

replies.msg:
It was a good suggestion that I would recommend if 樓主 is capable to crack open the back cover and resitting the graphic connector might be able to solve the flickering issue.
樓主 Please keep us posted.

replies.msg:
要用細鉗向上拆
唔好拉住條線拆
要夾住金屬接頭拆

但係你底板呢邊睇唔出有鬆
可能係芒嗰邊有問題
